name: Captain America
description: Captain America is a super-soldier known for his unwavering sense of justice, leadership, and dedication to protecting freedom. Armed with his iconic shield, he fights to defend the world from evil forces.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man is a genius billionaire playboy philanthropist who fights crime in his advanced, weaponized suit of armor. He uses technology to protect the world.

name: Thor
description: Thor, the god of thunder, wields his mighty hammer Mjolnir and fights to protect the realms. He is a powerful Asgardian warrior.

name: Black Widow
description: Black Widow is a highly skilled spy and combatant. She uses her intelligence and agility to protect the world from the shadows.

name: Hawkeye
description: Hawkeye is a master archer, using his precise marksmanship and agility to fight alongside the Avengers.

name: Hulk
description: Hulk possesses immense strength and near invulnerability, transforming into a powerful green giant when angered.

name: Spider-Man
description: Spider-Man uses his agility, spider-sense, and web-slinging abilities to fight crime and protect his city.

name: Doctor Strange
description: Doctor Strange is the Sorcerer Supreme, using magic and mystic arts to defend the Earth from supernatural threats.

name: Black Panther
description: Black Panther, the king of Wakanda, uses his enhanced abilities and vibranium suit to protect his kingdom and the world.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Scarlet Witch has the ability to manipulate reality and use chaos magic to fight against powerful foes.

name: Vision
description: Vision is a synthezoid with the ability to phase through objects, fly, and wield immense energy.

name: Ant-Man
description: Ant-Man can shrink to the size of an ant or grow to enormous proportions, using his size-changing abilities to fight evil.

name: Wasp
description: Wasp uses her shrinking technology and combat skills to fight alongside Ant-Man, utilizing agility and intelligence.

name: Star-Lord
description: Star-Lord leads the Guardians of the Galaxy with his cunning, combat skills, and love for music.

name: Gamora
description: Gamora is a deadly assassin and member of the Guardians of the Galaxy, known for her exceptional combat abilities.

name: Drax
description: Drax is a warrior with immense strength and combat abilities, driven by a desire for revenge against evil forces.

name: Rocket Raccoon
description: Rocket is a genetically enhanced raccoon with expert marksmanship and technical skills, often using his wit and weapons in battle.

name: Groot
description: Groot is a sentient tree-like creature with regenerative abilities and a powerful physical presence in combat.

name: Captain Marvel
description: Captain Marvel possesses cosmic powers, incredible strength, and the ability to fly, making her one of the most powerful heroes.

name: Falcon
description: Falcon uses advanced winged technology to fly and fight, serving as a skilled combatant and leader.
